item.title: How to run Traefik ingress controller as non-root
item.description: What is ingress? Ingress are (in a sense) reverse-proxies. But to understand, you need to know first what a proxy is – and only then will be able to understand the reverse of it. What is a proxy? For those of you who do not know what a proxy is, the word proxy describes someone/something acting on behalf of someone/something else. In terms on networking, when we are talking about a proxy server we are talking about one server that is acting on behalf of another server.
